concept.title: Solr
concept.shortdesc: The Solr destination writes data to a Solr node or cluster.

conbody.p: Solr destinationoverviewdestinationsSolrWhen you configure the Solr destination, you configure connection information for the node or cluster. You also define the indexing mode and map incoming fields to Solr fields. Mapped fields should have compatible data types.
You can configure the destination to index records individually or in batches.
